metadata.title: CVE-2024-56720 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:bpf, sockmap: Several fixes to bpf_msg_pop_dataSeveral fixes to bpf_msg_pop_data,1. In sk_msg_shift_left, we should put_page2. if (len == 0), return early is better3. pop the entire sk_msg (last == msg->sg.size) should be supported4. Fix for the value of variable "a"5. In sk_msg_shift_left, after shifting, i has already pointed to the nextelement. Addtional sk_msg_iter_var_next may result in BUG.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
